feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.2.11
entry.content:
Solves

  • https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/280 (6.2.6 Minimum Download Queue Size is ignored)
  • https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/263 (Minimum Download Queue Size" to "Maximum Download Queue Size)

Note that prior each app had it's own settings, since it was centralized; the background process was ignoring the new settings and fixed.

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.2.12
entry.content: Fixed - https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/282 [Request/Enhancement] Allow Selection of Release Type (Cinema/Digital/Physical) to Determine Future Movie Status

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.2.13
entry.content:
Swappar Fixes

https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/296 - Enable Swaparr check box not sticking https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/281 - Swaparr keeps finding the same downloads that it keeps striking out https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/247 - Swaparr - Not striking queued (stalled, no metadata) torrents and only processing small subset of stalled torrents

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.2.14
entry.content:
https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/271 - 6.2.0 readarr Error, invalid URL Format on Author Refresh (Fixed)

What's Changed

  • B014 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/298 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.2.12...6.2.14
